item.description:
Hey all!

On Monday, November 5 at 7pm, we will be holding a screening for The Orphanage, a supernatural thriller, at the Boston Common theater. To find out more about the movie, feel free to look at The Orphanage Official Website.

http://www.theorphana...

The director and screenwriter will be present for a Q&A immediately following the screening.

To recieve a pass to this movie, email me at advanced.screening@gmail.com and I'll get one out to you as soon as possible!

Sarah

[edit by JediFonger] This film opens 12/28/2007 limited release. So this is a VERY special SUPER advanced screening. It has only been shown @film festival circuits.

PS Remember this is screening only. We won't be having a discussion afterwards. The film will be downstairs in auditorium #1. That means there'll be a LOOOONG line. I'll try to be there around 6PM. I'll be wearing my green hat w/meetup logo+my screename JediFonger. If you want to sit together, look for me.
-JediFonger
item.name: Advanced Screening: The Orphanage
